Name: Celestial Rebirth
Story Background: In the depths of adversity, the celestial energies coalesced, imbuing fallen heroes with renewed vitality and a radiant rebirth to continue the fight against darkness.
Ability: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains indestructible until end of turn. Exile Celestial Rebirth.
Appearance Description: A radiant burst of celestial energy encompassing a fallen hero, lifting them from the ground with a transcendent glow and sense of divine renewal. The artwork is suffused with brilliant whites and shimmering golds, evoking a sense of transcendent rebirth and radiant vitality.
